question: On Sunday, Ellen wants to exercise for five times the amount of time he did on Saturday and Friday combined. On Friday he exercised for 19 minutes. On Saturday he exercised for 11 minutes. How many minutes does he have to exercise on Sunday to reach his goal?
answer:
On Friday and Saturday he exercised a total of 30 minutes because 19 + 11 = <<19+11=30>>30
On Sunday he has to exercise for 150 minutes because 30*5 = <<30*5=150>>150
#### 150
